category: Product > materials, treatments and surfaces (including paneling)
description_html:
Striata Fusion Communal Tabletop

This innovative communal tabletop design using TorZo Striata Fusion is ideal for bringing small groups together in hotels, restaurants, bars, and multi-family residential community spaces. Featuring a geometric motif and available in a variety of color options and finishes, this unique TorZo communal tabletop demonstrates what is possible with TorZo.

About Striata Fusion -- panels are made from SFI-certifed Douglas Fir using a unique layering technology that creates an attractive linear asthetic. Infusion with a durable and colorful acrylic resin takes the linear pattern to a new level of style. The proven durability and performance of Striata Fusion make this surface ideal for any tabletop.
